All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Summonable, Resettable
public class Ally extends NonPlayerCharacter implements Resettable, Summonable
Class representing the Ally. It implements the Resettable, Summonable interfaces. Created by:

1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      If the game is being reset during this round, return DoNothingAction for Ally; else Select and return an action to perform for Ally on the current turn.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed
      See Also:
      • DoNothingAction

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor otherActor, String direction, GameMap map)
      Returns a new collection of the Actions that the otherActor can do to Ally. Also, Attack Behaviour will be put into the behaviours HashMap of Ally, if it can attack the otherActor, e.g. the otherActor is not Player, Ally, Trader and otherActor is not having capability of PROTECTED.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      A collection of Actions
      See Also:
      • Status.FRIENDLY_TO_PLAYER
      • Status.HOSTILE_TO_ENEMY
      • Status.PROTECTED
      • AttackBehaviour
      • Actor.allowableActions(Actor, String, GameMap)

    • reset

      public void reset()
      When the game is reset, this method will be executed and Ally will be removed from the game map.
      Specified by:
      reset in interface Resettable
      See Also:
      • ResetManager.getInstance()
      • ResetManager.getPlayerIsResting()

    • getSummonSpot

      public Location getSummonSpot(Location summonGroundLocation)
      Returns the location where the Ally can be summoned.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
